APR FC vs Mukura Victory Sports

APR FC 0-1 Mukura Victory Sports

Uko umukino uri kugenda

: Ishimwe Israel

Amafoto

18:34

Rwarutabura yishimiraga ko umukeba atsinzwe

17:53

Umutoza wa Mukura VS akomeje kwandika amateka

Umutoza wa Mukura VS, Haringingo Francis, birasa n'aho yamaze kubaka ikipe ishobora guhangana n'ikipe iyo ariyo yose mu Rwanda kuko nta kipe ikomeye atarabasha gukuraho amanota atatu. Nyuma ya Rayon Sports iyari itahiwe ni APR FC

17:39

Umukino APR yakiriyemo Mukura VS urarangiye.

Mukura VS itahanye amanota atatu itsinze APR FC igitego 1-0 mu mukino w'ikirarane utarakiniwe igihe kubera imikino mpuzamahanga, aya makipe yarimo. Abakinnyi b'iyi kipe y'i Huye bari mu byishimo by'ikirenga mu gihe abafana bari kubyina bataraka bati 'Mukura twaje'

17:37

Amahirwe ya nyuma kuri APR FC

Abakinnyi ba APR FC bagerageje gusatira cyane kugeza ku isegonda rya nyuma ariko ntibahirwa. Ab'inyuma ba Mukura VS baryamiye ijanja bakiza izamu ryabo.

17:36

91 APR FC ibuze amahirwe yabazwe

Rutahizamu Sugira Ernest acenze ab'inyuma ba Mukura VS asigara arebana n'umunyezamu ateye umupira wo hasi uca muri santimetero nke z'izamu.

17:34

17:31

88' Mukura yokeje igitutu APR FC

Abakinnyi ba Mukura VS bakomeje kotsa igitutu izamu rya APR FC ririnzwe na Kimenyi Yves.

17:30

85' Ikarita y'umuhondo ihawe Mukura VS

17:28

84' GUSIMBUZA KWA APR FC

Penaliti ya Mukura VS

Abakinnyi 11 bagiye kubanzamo ku ruhande rwa APR FC

14:25

Umukino wa mbere ubimburira indi mu 2019

Ikaze kuri Stade ya Kigali i Nyamirambo.

APR FC igiye kwakira Mukura VS mu mukino wa mbere wa 2019, uri mu itarakiniwe igihe kubera imikino mpuzamahanga aya makipe yaserukiyemo u Rwanda.

Uyu mukino wagombaga kuba ku wa 1 Ukuboza 2018. Icyo gihe APR FC yiteguraga gucakirana na Club Africain yo muri Tunisia mu mikino ya CAF Champions League mu gihe Mukura VS yari hafi guhura na Free State Stars yo muri Afurika yÃ¢â‚¬â„¢Epfo muri CAF Confederation Cup.
